data.system_settings: Sony Xperia Z5 Premium, everything default including font.
data.actual_result: The `_` is placed before the channel name like `_#testchannel`
data.expected_result: The `_` should be placed on the correct place like in `#test_channel`
data.short_description: Channel name with `_` not displayed properly on android notifications
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a text channel with `_` in the name somewhere (Middle preferred) - get mentioned - see the channel name incorrect in the notifications.
